overview: Helena Price Over the Summer, when things were slow, the boss would have me do odd jobs around his house. His wife teased me and one day she was in her bed in sexy lingerie and stockings. She told me to lay down and when I did she blindfolded and handcuffed me. Ms. Price stripped me and then started spanking and cropping my ass. Before I knew it she was pouring "lotion" on my ass and then she rammed a strapon right up my butt-hole. She fucked me and taunted me about the raise I wanted until I just couldn't take anymore. I've never had a woman fuck me like that before.
tagline: Will Your Boss Fuck You Up The Ass... Literally?
title: Whoreable Bosses
